prompts: Create a crab-like Pokemon with vibrant orange claws and a soft white belly.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a small crustacean, perfect for coastal regions.
Generate a water-type Pokemon with distinctive large claws and a playful personality.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in sandy beaches, showcasing bright orange and white colors.
Imagine a Pokemon that scuttles quickly on the shore, with a rounded body and cheerful demeanor.
Design a Pokemon featuring oversized pincers, ideal for battles in aquatic environments.
Show me a Pokemon that combines elements of a crab and a playful, energetic character.
